data.title: Sedate But Enjoyable Place to Eat
data.text: My wife and I and another couple (who are long time friends) at lunch at Twigs and Tea Room in mid October.  The tea was the focus of the meal, and it was served with great attention to detail.  We each had a very tasty lunch.  I suspect that it is typically a place where women go for tea and lunch, but the other male and I were made to feel welcome and a part of the atmosphere of the place.  We were the only males present.  Twigs is small, but they are expanding to the rear of the current building.  This will give more room for more table and for more space between tables.  Our lunch was a delight, and I am confident that we will return to Twigs on our next visit to the Fishers area.

data.title: A charming spot for afternoon tea
data.text: My wife likes to meet her friends for lunch here and has always said how good the food is. She has also had afternoon tea here and likes it really well too.  This past Valentine's Day I took her there for afternoon tea and they didn't disappoint.  We could select from a variety of teas and really enjoyed the finger sandwiches, scones and pastries that are presented on a traditional 3 tiered server. We really enjoyed this special time together.

data.title: Great lunch restaurant
data.text: Excellent restaurant - everything was delicious and good service!! Restaurant closes at 3pm and we (2-people) arrived at 2:30pm - was surprised that the hostess had to check with the chef to see if it was ok to seat us. To me, a closing time is the time the restaurant stops seating & serving, not 1/2-hour prior to closing.....should not gave been a question at all!!

data.title: I can't wait to go back!
data.text: Lovely lunch , nice place for girls gatherings. The decor is so cute. Small gift shop has unique items. I had quiche and a scone quite good!!  Service is pleasant!

data.title: Perfect English tea
data.text:
The service was superb. They made us feel right at home.  The food was delightful, and everything sounded looked and tasted good.  The bread pudding for dessert was the best I've ever had.   
Yes it's rather small, but not that small.  I'll call it cozy.

data.title: Wonderful food and a really neat ambiance
data.text: The cinnamon tea is wonderful, brewed in a teapot at your table.  Their scones melt in your mouth.  I love their chicken and egg salad, but their quiche is also wonderful.  What really makes this place is the wonderful caring service where everything is served with love.  You must get reservations, they are always full so be sure to book a couple days ahead.  They also have lots of home decorating items which are so much fun to look through, be sure also to check out the unique and cool jewelry items.  My husband was not excited about going (too girly), but after tasting the food, he keeps wanting to go back.

data.title: Make reservations
data.text: Second visit. First visit we waited for a table, this tea room is very small. Lunch was great and tea excellent.  Second visit we were seated, but large group in room and it was really noisy. Sandwiches are very good, attractive when served, and tea very nice, little pricey. It is a cute stop and gift area a must see.

data.title: Great place for a shower
data.text: We had a bridal shower with 10 women this weekend and they were very accommodating and helpful. Everyone really enjoyed their food and tea. Women had their tea hot and also had the different flavors as an iced tea. Lots of great options and a great staff.

data.title: Don't Miss This
data.text: This was one of the most enjoyable lunches I have experienced this year. If you like tea rooms and the food that goes with it, this is the place for you. It is small but not cramped. The servers were friendly and helpful.  I had the chicken salad and a scone.....delicious!  There was a nice assortment of teas served hot or cold. Take some time to shop at the boutique before you leave.

data.title: Flavorful tea
data.text: This was a planned trip with my sisters and niece. The tea was excellent! Very full of flavor and steeped in the proper British fashion. It is a small place with a low ceiling and was rather overwhelming when we were there due to a few people who talked very loud. The food is not priced for frequent visits and portions aren't large, but very tasty. It was a nice experience and we did purchase some tea to take home, but I don't foresee another trip.

data.title: Cute
data.text: Peaked our interest so we stopped. We had tea (of course) and a sandwich. The sandwich was very good and the selections very interesting. My choice was one with a cranberry chutney on turkey served on a croissant. Tea was great and they have many choices. There is a cute little gift shop to entertain you on the way in and out. It is small so are reservations. My guest was the only male in the place but we had a great time.

data.title: Great food, nice people!
data.text: I took my daughter to lunch for her birthday.  I had the quiche of the day which was delicious, and it came with a broccoli slaw that was equally good.  I also had a small scone that was slightly sweet, but with a bit of savory and flavored with rosemary. I enjoyed the unusual combinations of flavors.  I had a vanilla iced tea which was also very good.  The staff went out of their way to make sure we were happy.  I'll definitely go back!

data.title: Loved it!
data.text: Had lunch here with a friend.  The tea was very nice (and I am not a tea-drinker) and the food was wonderful. Service was excellent. The atmosphere is a bit loud as there are a lot of ladies' groups there, but it is fun.  Doesn't hurt that you can shop and browse their lovely store before and after eating!  Overall a really nice experience.  I look forward to returning.

data.title: Delightful  , delicious lunch in Fishers
data.text: A cottage has been converted into a cafe as well as a unique gift shop.  Be sure to allow time to browse the two floors of attractive gifts .  Their menu features sandwiches, salads and quiche.  Melt in your mouth scones are featured with most entrees.  There is an extensive tea selection available . Service was friendly; no sense of rushing , however.
